data.title: NetSuite Salaries in California: How much does NetSuite pay in California?
data.meta_description: NetSuite's pay rate in California is $114,065 yearly and $55 hourly. NetSuite's starting pay in California is $77,000. NetSuite salaries range from $38,952 yearly for Billing Specialist to $134,248 yearly for a Director Of Sales.
data.text:
Highest paying cities in California for NetSuite

The highest paying cities in California for NetSuite employees are San Mateo, Redwood City, and Sunnyvale.

NetSuite workers in San Mateo earn an average salary of $119,362 a year, compared to Redwood City with an average salary of $119,257 and Sunnyvale with an average salary of $119,099.

Highest paying cities in California at NetSuite

RankCityAverage NetSuite salaryHourly pay1San Mateo, CA$119,362$572Redwood City, CA$119,257$573Sunnyvale, CA$119,099$574Santa Clara, CA$119,010$575Santa Monica, CA$112,459$54

NetSuite salaries in California by department

The departments with the highest salaries for NetSuite employees in California are Engineering, IT, and Finance.

California NetSuite employees in the Engineering department earn an average salary of $136,093 a year, compared to an average salary of $132,296 in the IT department and $120,123 in the Finance department.
